page.title: 19ALDERCOMBE FARM
page.content: Our farm house is one of the oldest farm houses in Kilkhampton.It was built in about 1595 but there were probably other houses or buildings before that time.In the past the farm totalled 500 acres but now it is only 200 acres.Mrs thynne once owned the the farm and used to let it to my great-great uncle who then bought it. In 1919 my great grandfather bought the farm and it was then bought by my grandfather.In 1936 the farm was split into parts leaving 200 acres at Aldercombe.My father now rents it from grandfather.There used to be a watermill down in the valley between Aldercombe and Darracott which was used by the villagers and farmers of the parish {By Kate Petherick {
